ygData.messageBody:
*Thanks for the info. I once saw a screenshot of Aradune wearing full
*green plate and the 2 handed Fiery Avenger. Is that an only paladin
*weapon, because I heard that when they tested it in the Beta, many
*classes could use it.

Aye, up til that final battle of Mithaniel Marr and Innoruuk at the end of
Phase4, I had always heard that the Fiery Avenger was a Paladin-only weapon,
and that Aradune had one even as a Ranger simply because he is Aradune.
After Mithaniel fell, several screenshots substantiate that the Fiery
Avenger could be used by any class. What is unclear to me and to most
everyone I know is whether or not that Fiery Avenger being able to be used
by anyone was a special one just for that battle? Or if that was the rule
for all swords of that type.

-- Amoroth
